channel.title: How To Run My Server, Error?
channel.description:
im trying to run my server but i cant these are the errors that come up does anyone know what to do :confused:
What should i do? Is this an error or is it right/wrong anything i need to do to put my server up help please.
Error 1 (compiler) these are the error's 'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
Error 2 (runserver) Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: How To Run My Server, Error?
item.dc:creator: @Taylor_John0 Taylor John0
item.description:
@Taylor_John0 wrote:

Make sure if you have jdk6u1, you go in compile and runserver (mod t’s codes doesn’t do this) and change path from jdk1.6.0 to jdk1.6.0_01 or it won’t work

Read full topic
